org.aesop.runtime.producer.avro
Class MysqlAvroEventFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.aesop.runtime.producer.avro.MysqlAvroEventFactory

public class MysqlAvroEventFactory
extends java.lang.Object

MysqlAvroEventFactory is a factory to create databus avro events and append to event buffer. 

     
 
  • Provides means to serialize avro events
    • 
 
  • Provides means to extract key for an event
    •

Version:
1.0, 07 Mar 2014
Author:
Shoury B

Creates databus events and appends to event buffer

Parameters:
changeEntry - db change entry
eventBuffer - event buffer to which events are appended
enableTracing -
dbusEventsStatisticsCollector - statistics collector
Returns:
length of the event data added
Throws:
com.linkedin.databus2.producers.EventCreationException - Thrown when event creation failed for a databus source
com.linkedin.databus.core.UnsupportedKeyException - Thrown when the data type of the "key" field is not a supported type
com.linkedin.databus2.core.DatabusException - Generic Databus Exception
